title: Dancers, Entrance on Stage
credit_line: Acquired through the generosity of the Sarah Mellon Scaife Family
provenance_text:
Hilaire-Germain-Edgar Degas [1834-1917], until 1917; Atelier Degas, Paris, France, after 1917; (sold at Galerie Georges Petit, Paris, France, May 6, 1918 until May 8, 1918, no. 209, illustrated) [1]; purchased by Durand-Ruel and Ambroise Vollard [2]; purchased by Max Pellequer, Paris, France [3]; (Sam Salz, Inc., New York, NY, by 1966); purchased by Museum, December 1966. 
NOTES:1. This was the first sale of Atelier Degas. 2. Durand-Ruel stock no. D12731, and Ambroise Vollard stock number 1CS23, 8100 F. 3. Purchased after World War I.

Updated by CGK
July 2012
